definition: to possess great magical power/to possess remarkable abilities
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Nuwa not only to the day of salvation, but also in creation, work miracles.
sentences.chinese: 女媧不但補天救世，還創造萬物，神通廣大。

sentences.english: I was no longer Lucy who knew what was best for everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 我不再是知道那個神通廣大的露西了。

sentences.english: Lee is a person who would spend money secretly to make people believe he was infinitely capable and influential.
sentences.chinese: 他背地裏花錢，爲要人們相信他神通廣大，有權有勢。

sentences.english: You're big in Naas. You haven't bought off any judges, have you?
sentences.chinese: 你在納斯神通廣大。你沒有買通過什麼法官吧，是嗎？

definition: to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
to burn incense and worship Buddha
evil has its retribution (idiom); to suffer the consequences of one's bad deeds/sow the wind and reap the whirlwind (Hosea 8:7)
(Buddhism) to deliver all living creatures from suffering (idiom)
to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem
to be successful in every endeavor
